task.title: Exporting Pipelines
task.shortdesc: Export pipelines to create backups or to use the pipelines with another .

context.p: pipelinesexportingWhen you export a pipeline, generates a JSON file named after the pipeline, as follows: <pipeline name>.json.

step.cmd: From the Home page, select pipelines in the list and then click the Export icon.
Or, to export a pipeline in the pipeline canvas, click the More icon for the pipeline and then click Export or Export with Library Definitions.
step.info: When you export with library definitions, the generated JSON file includes the definition of each stage library used in the pipeline. You can use either method to export a pipeline.
step.stepresult: The console generates the JSON files and saves them to your default downloads directory.
